name: Taste Ma Lazor
description:
Are you bored to death? Do you need another time waster beside chromes dinosaur game? ... well if you are that bored don't worry I got you covered.

In this game you try to destroy as many boxes as possible.
Role-playing as beam of laser changing its colors to match the boxes and going up a streak for the glory of the highest score which is defined locally.
So, not much glory to be had if you asked me.

Simple infinite runner style game.
